definition: abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)

sentences.english: "Eternal Lake of Scented Souls", it is growing the value of time and space highlights the eternal realm.
sentences.chinese: “萬古香魂”，益加凸現價值時空的永恆境界。

sentences.english: The other broilers group in the model.
sentences.chinese: 模式之愛拔益加肉雞組。

sentences.english: With the increasing of social competition, there are more and more people becoming mortgage slave.
sentences.chinese: 隨着社會競爭的日益加劇，越來越多的人成爲房奴。

sentences.english: Analysts fret about the growing risks of nonperforming loans.
sentences.chinese: 分析師則擔心不良貸款日益加劇的風險。

sentences.english: ERAN HAKIM: "We see inequality going higher and higher inside countries and between countries."
sentences.chinese: 我看到國家內部，國與國之間的不平等日益加劇。

sentences.english: Tension is building betweeen the two countries.
sentences.chinese: 兩國之間的緊張情緒日益加劇。

sentences.english: Competition in major eastern cities such as Beijing and Shanghai is intensifying.
sentences.chinese: 東部大型城市如北京和上海的競爭日益加劇。

sentences.english: The effect of urban nonpoint source pollution (NSP) on China's water quality is being increasingly intensified.
sentences.chinese: 城市非點源污染對中國水環境的威脅日益加劇。

sentences.english: On every continent some rivers are drying out, threatening severe water shortages.1?
sentences.chinese: 每一塊大陸上都有河流枯涸，水資源緊缺日益加劇。

sentences.english: The Xerox cuts were the latest sign of growing unease in technology.
sentences.chinese: 施樂的裁員再次顯示了科技行業的不安日益加劇。

sentences.english: As we grow older, our experiences become richer and richer.
sentences.chinese: 隨着年齡的增長，我們的閱歷也益加豐富。

definition: increasingly/more and more/ever more/all the more
even/going as far as to/so much so that
at one's convenience/when one has time
to have no time to (do sth)
recently/until now/up to the present/lately/also written 爾來|尔来
